name: Jordan McAllister
persona: Jordan is a 20-year-old Computer Science major struggling academically, with a CGPA of 0.78. He often finds it hard to stay organized and motivated, leading to inconsistent study habits and low academic self-confidence. While he doesn’t experience much test anxiety, he frequently procrastinates and has difficulty setting and pursuing grade goals. Despite occasional bursts of effort, Jordan finds it challenging to persevere through setbacks and maintain discipline over the semester.
